img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Thunderclap_26.jpg)
Head down the stairs, where you'll find another sealed building on the right guarded by an Overseeing Monk and some Thunder Rhino Masters, and several sets of stairs to the left.
img_below_text:
Take the very first staircase down to a lower platform on the left with a small hut guarded by a Supporter Monk.
![Wukong Thunderclap 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Thunderclap_28.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 26 from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Thunderclap_26.jpg)
Head down the stairs, where you'll find another sealed building on the right guarded by an Overseeing Monk and some Thunder Rhino Masters, and several sets of stairs to the left."
            - Following Text: "Take the very first staircase down to a lower platform on the left with a small hut guarded by a Supporter Monk.
![Wukong Thunderclap 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Thunderclap_28.jpg)"

            Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist, Wukong, standing at the top of a snowy staircase, ready to confront an enemy below. The setting is a wintry landscape with a sealed building guarded by an Overseeing Monk and Thunder Rhino Masters, indicating a challenging encounter. This image captures a moment of preparation before Wukong descends to engage in combat, highlighting the strategic elements of the gameplay as players navigate through the temple area.
